text:
Nick Lewis
Profile
A strategic, astute and influential director with strong leadership and communication skills, excellent client and partner management expertise, and a vast track record of developing marketplace innovation, product enhancements and sales strategy to deliver sustainable growth and profitability for companies from start-ups to leading multinationals
Career & Key Achievements to Date
Business Resilience & Continuity Director 							     Oct 2019-present
GFirst LEP: Gloucestershire’s Local Enterprise Partnership: Supporting Gloucestershire’s businesses
Leveraged personal experience of the UK and EMEA to advise local companies on improving business performance
Provided the insight and expertise required by clients to develop strategies for the UK’s exit from the EU
Head of Bu Nick Lewis
Profile
A strategic, astute and influential director with strong leadership and communication skills, excellent client and partner management expertise, and a vast track record of developing marketplace innovation, product enhancements and sales strategy to deliver sustainable growth and profitability for companies from start-ups to leading multinationals
Career & Key Achievements to Date
Business Resilience & Continuity Director 							     Oct 2019-present
GFirst LEP: Gloucestershire’s Local Enterprise Partnership: Supporting Gloucestershire’s businesses
Leveraged personal experience of the UK and EMEA to advise local companies on improving business performance
Provided the insight and expertise required by clients to develop strategies for the UK’s exit from the EU
Head of Business Partnerships & Sales Performance, UK & Ireland				  Aug 2017-Oct 2019
Golden Charter Investment Trust, Glasgow, UK
Managed, developed and motivated 30 Business Managers and 2 Division Heads in the UK and Ire for a £1Bn trust
Oversaw the performance of financial advisors, corporate agreements & partnerships, and 1,300+ independent clients
Developed digital engagement and value proposition with clients, educating them to a customer-centric model
Increased client participation by 28% and boosted the client relationship indicator from 56% to 81% i.e. very satisfied
Foresaw a contracting market, won the business case to transform the trust’s strategy, and grew market share by 22%
Led the culture change agenda and implementation required for the successful uptake of a cloud-based CRM system where none previously existed
Improved forecasting and performance management using CRM data and enabled evidence-based decision-making
Applied customer data to turnaround declines in the customer base, securing a sustainable business in only 12 months
Identified problems in business partnerships, increasing the support offered to partners and improving collaboration
Reorganised the field engagement team and model, creating tiers of service for different customers sizes and needs
Spearheaded a training program on account management & business logic, improving targeted engagement & results
International Solutions Sales Director, EMEA  							   Sep 2013-Oct 2017
Schneider Electric, Energy & Sustainability Services, Paris, France
Led the delivery of strategy, planning, and services across the New Market Business Development team at Schneider
Managed, developed and empowered EMEA-based sales and project teams, reviewing and improving performance
Devised and implemented effective sales and up-selling strategies and techniques for software & services solutions
Exceeded targets in new market segments, growing market share in new locations and increasing annuity contracts
Senior Global Account Director									 Jan 2011-Sep 2013
Xerox IT Outsourcing, EMEA
Spearheaded the adoption of a customer-centric approach for selling integrated solutions to new & existing clients
Dismantled silos within the organisation, forging strong client relations and generating preferred supplier contracts
Liaised with Marketing on branding and digital engagement, with Finance on financial modelling, and HR on T&Cs
Established a client engagement plan to better understanding customer requirements, to deliver customer success
Developed and implemented strategies that increased the number and value of multi-year and high-yield contracts
Bettered Logica, Adobe & CSC to win a £35M EMEA multi-year contract, which led to securing £150M in global revenues
The EMEA-wide project included cloud, data hosting, hard /soft ware, cloud, helpdesk, services and TUPE of staff
Career & Key Achievements to Date (continued)
Customer Portfolio Director | Global Account Director | Director Customer Relationships		Jan 2003-Dec 2010
CA Technologies, EMEA: Mainframe and distributed IT infrastructure applications
Joined CA in 2003 and was promoted from Director Customer Relationships through to Customer Portfolio Director
Led key portfolios and a 12-strong virtual team of Portfolio Managers across EMEA, exceeding sales target by 148%
Provided coaching, mentoring and expert advice to Portfolio Managers on

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
